caption.p: (A) Native : non-native species aboveground biomass ratio in control, activated-carbon-treated (AC live) and activated-carbon-treated and sterilized (AC sterile) soils. (B) Total aboveground biomass for all native species and non-native species in control, activated-carbon-treated (AC live) and activated-carbon-treated and sterilized (AC sterile) soils (mean ± SE). Letters denote differences among treatments at the α < 0.05 level.
